author: djames
msg: Simplify usage of the RevisionLog class by adding a new 'merge_metadata'
method to track merges. Remove 'mergeprops' global variable and update
associated functions to use the new 'merge_metadata' method instead.
(RevisionLog.url): New instance variable, used by new merge_metadata method.

author: dlr
msg: (SVN_ERR): Adjust macro doc string to remove innuendo about its
expression argument only being a function call.  It's equally valid
to use this macro on variables.

author: dlr
msg: * COMMITTERS: Formatting tweak to alignment of giovannibajo's committer name.

author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r19110, tweaking 'svnmerge.py integrated' error handling.

author: dlr
msg: Use svnmerge.py's error() function for all its error handling.
(global, main, check_old_prop_version): Replace code to print error
message and exit with call to error().
